title: Hello World
description: Alan wants to say hello to everyone. Given a name, please print out what Alan will say.
input_format:
A string.
1 <= the length of the string <= 100.
output_format: Please print out "hello" and the given name.

title: Sorting Numbers
description: Given n and n positive numbers, please sort the numbers in increasing order.
input_format:
The first line will contain a number n. 1 <= n <= 50.
The second line will contain n numbers ai where 1 <= i <= n and 1 <= ai <= 2000.
output_format: Please print out the sorted ai.

title: Exponentiating
description: Given a and n, please print out a^n mod 1000000007.
input_format:
There are 2 numbers in the input, a and n respectively.
1 <= a <= 20.
1 <= n <= 1000000000.
output_format: Please print a number a^n mod 1000000007.

title: Divide the Candies
description:
Alan's dad wants to divide the candies to Alan and Alan's sister as fairly as possible.
Given the weights of the candies, please divide them to 2 groups, where the sum of the weights in group1 and group2 are w1 and w2 respectively.
Please print out the minimum difference between w1 and w2.
input_format:
The first line contains an integer n, which is the number of candies.
The second line contains n positive integers ai.
 ai indicates the weight of the i th candy where 1 <= i <= n.
1 <= n <= 40.
1 <= ai <= 1000.
output_format: The minimum possible difference between w1 and w2, where w1 is the sum of weights in group1 and w2 is the sum of weights in group2.
